description: Learn the fundamentals of Java programming including OOP concepts, data structures, and algorithms.
title: Introduction to Java Programming

lessons.title: Java Basics and Syntax
lessons.content: Introduction to Java syntax, variables, data types, and operators.

lessons.title: Object-Oriented Programming
lessons.content: Understanding classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism in Java.

lessons.title: Collections Framework
lessons.content: Working with ArrayList, HashMap, and other collection classes.

description: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build modern web applications.
title: Web Development Fundamentals

lessons.title: HTML Structure
lessons.content: Learn HTML tags, semantic elements, and document structure.

lessons.title: CSS Styling
lessons.content: Style your web pages with CSS including layouts and responsive design.

description: Deep dive into essential data structures and algorithm design techniques.
title: Data Structures and Algorithms

lessons.title: Arrays and Linked Lists
lessons.content: Understanding linear data structures and their operations.

lessons.title: Trees and Graphs
lessons.content: Exploring hierarchical and network data structures.

lessons.title: Sorting Algorithms
lessons.content: Learn bubble sort, merge sort, quick sort and their complexities.

description: Learn SQL, database design, normalization, and query optimization.
title: Database Management Systems

lessons.title: Introduction to Databases
lessons.content: Understanding DBMS concepts, relational model, and ER diagrams.

lessons.title: SQL Fundamentals
lessons.content: Writing SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE queries.

description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and Python libraries.
title: Machine Learning Basics

lessons.title: ML Introduction
lessons.content: Overview of supervised and unsupervised learning.
